summary: Build a professional, modern, light-themed, responsive marketing website for the educational coaching institute “Start To Succeed” with Home, About, Courses, and Contact sections, strong CTAs, SEO/accessibility, and contact integrations (call/WhatsApp, map, form).
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive layout; light theme with blue/red accent palette and modern card-based UI.
Include SEO-friendly semantic structure (H1/H2 hierarchy) and meta tags; prioritize performance and accessibility.
Contact integrations must support tel: click-to-call and WhatsApp deep link; WhatsApp button should be sticky on mobile.
Site includes Home, About, Courses, Contact sections/pages plus footer with external social links and map embed.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal, premium academic logo mark with book/laurel motif in blue and red on transparent background (sts-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Light-themed hero background illustration with subtle academic elements and ample whitespace (sts-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
- Simple favicon/app icon derived from the logo, high-contrast on light backgrounds (sts-favicon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a modern, light-themed, fully responsive (mobile-first) marketing website for the coaching institute “Start To Succeed” using a white background with blue/red accent colors, clean typography, spacious layout, modern cards/icons, soft shadows, and smooth hover animations across interactive elements.

Implement the Home page with: (1) Hero section containing a headline, subheadline, and three CTA buttons: “Call Now”, “WhatsApp Us”, and “Enroll Now”; (2) “Why Choose Start To Succeed” section using icon cards; (3) “Courses Offered” highlights for Classes 6–12, IIT-JEE Foundation, and NEET Foundation; (4) a strong CTA banner near the bottom of the page.

Implement an About Us page/section containing content blocks for Mission, Vision, and Teaching Methodology with a student-centric, results-oriented emphasis and a trust-focused, academic, premium tone appropriate for students and parents.

Implement a Courses page/section that lists (A) Board classes (6–12) and (B) Competitive foundation (IIT-JEE & NEET), where each course/card includes a short description and a CTA that drives enrollment/contact intent (e.g., scroll to contact form or open WhatsApp).

Implement a Contact Us page/section that displays the institute’s address and phone/WhatsApp details, provides a contact form (name, phone, optional email, message), and includes a Google Map embed for the address. Use the exact business information provided.

Implement a site-wide footer containing quick links (to Home, About, Courses, Contact), contact details (address + phone), and social links using the exact provided URLs for Facebook and Google My Business.

Implement functional contact integrations: (1) click-to-call phone links using the provided phone number; (2) a sticky “WhatsApp” button visible on mobile that opens a WhatsApp chat to the provided number; (3) ensure the “Call Now” and “WhatsApp Us” hero buttons use these integrations.

Add SEO and accessibility enhancements: use semantic headings (single H1 per page/primary view), descriptive meta title/description per page, Open Graph basics, accessible form labels, keyboard navigability, visible focus states, and image alt text. Ensure fast loading by minimizing heavy assets and lazy-loading non-critical content (e.g., map embed).

Generate and include branded static images as frontend assets: a primary institute logo and a light-themed hero background/illustration aligned with an academic, trust-focused, premium look. Store them under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the header/hero and as favicon/app icon where appropriate.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create light-themed responsive website UI (white background, blue/red accents, clean typography, modern cards/icons, soft shadows, hover animations) for Start To Succeed
Implement Home page sections: Hero (headline/subheadline) with CTAs (Call Now, WhatsApp Us, Enroll Now), Why Choose icon cards, Courses Offered highlights, and strong CTA banner
Implement About Us section with mission, vision, and teaching methodology content (student-centric, results-oriented)
Implement Courses section: Board classes (6–12) and Competitive Foundation (IIT-JEE & NEET) with short descriptions and CTAs
Implement Contact Us section: address, phone/WhatsApp, contact form, and Google Map embed
Add footer with quick links, contact details, and social media integration (Facebook + Google My Business links)
Add functional contact integrations: click-to-call phone number and sticky mobile click-to-WhatsApp button
Add SEO + performance + accessibility: optimized headings/meta tags, fast loading, accessibility-friendly structure

Add backend support for the contact form by implementing canister methods to create/store contact inquiries (including timestamp) and allow the frontend to submit inquiries. Persist inquiries in stable storage so they survive canister upgrades.
